LanguageData.RimGamble.PayoutArrivedDesc: The payment for your successful bet has arrived.
LanguageData.RimGamble.OnlineGamblingNetworkDesc: Place bets on ongoing wagers. Bets are made in silver, which must be in range of an orbital trade beacon. If won, a bet's payout is made inversely proportional to the likelihood of success.
LanguageData.RimGamble.BetReturnedDesc: Since you have updated your bets, some silver has been returned to you.
LanguageData.RimGamble.WagerLostDesc: You lost a bet you placed money on. No money will be returned.
